concept.title: What This Manual Is
concept.shortdesc: This manual presents a comprehensive and complete reference to the commmands in the ConTeXt typesetting system, available setups, and example use. This manual does not intend to serve as a tutorial or other instructional material.

conbody.p: This manual presents, for each command in the ConTeXt typesetting system:

ul.li: Options available for the command (if applicable).
Settings available for the command (if applicable).
A minimal working example of the command in use.
Extended examples of the command in use (optional).
Rendered output of the example (if applicable).
